text:
trying to access arraylist of strings "journals" in detail.html with <input th:field="${event.eventDetails.journals}" class="form-control"> returns error:
Caused by: org.hibernate.AnnotationException: Association 'org.launchcode.codingevents.models.EventDetails.journals' targets an unknown entity named 'java.util.ArrayList'

Anyone else have an arraylist of string in a model class you had to access with thymeleaf?
